channel.title: Comments on: A Sucker Born Every Minute …

item.title: By: steven
item.dc:creator: steven
item.description:
this is quite funny.
Sometimes you gotta stop, and read the instructions.
item.content:encoded:
this is quite funny.

Sometimes you gotta stop, and read the instructions.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.content:encoded:
Another question and answer about the NPC swindlah.

Read all of the descriptions carefully and the name of the vendor. He’s a shady character. Sure, his amulets technically do what they say BUT they are all things that can happen without the amulets.

My god, he’s like Satan!

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description: Aha, flikr archive (awesome how you do that)....heh I'm really hoping he is joking. If not, I need to sell him this mace I got called The Stoppable Force. I'm sure he'd love it.
item.content:encoded: Aha, flikr archive (awesome how you do that)….heh I’m really hoping he is joking. If not, I need to sell him this mace I got called The Stoppable Force. I’m sure he’d love it.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: Hehe... small lesson indeed given how fast you make gold in Outlands. (I play for a few hours and I make at least fifty, so where's the harm in losing 25 to being stupid?)
item.content:encoded: Hehe… small lesson indeed given how fast you make gold in Outlands. (I play for a few hours and I make at least fifty, so where’s the harm in losing 25 to being stupid?)

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description:
No wow forums at work...what's the complaint? That the amulets do nothing? I'd think after reading the description on the immortality one (which describes a CR), it'd be obvious...
This is just the upgrade to BB's ring seller.
item.content:encoded:
No wow forums at work…what’s the complaint? That the amulets do nothing? I’d think after reading the description on the immortality one (which describes a CR), it’d be obvious…

This is just the upgrade to BB’s ring seller.
